CCStrategy
Iterface that implements the strategy pattern for the common goal cards.
ChatMessage
Represents a message for outgoing chat messages for a specific player of a party.
chooseConnectionController
Controller for the connection scene.
ChosenTilesMessage
Represents a message that contains information about chosen tiles.
CLI
It implements the view interface managing CLI's output.
Client
It represents a client that is able to establish connection with a sever, both via socket and RMI (exclusive).
clientController
It checks the correctness of the input client side.
ClientHandler
It manages multiple client connections via socket.
command
It manages the pending commands not yet fully executed.
CommonCard
Represents a common goal card.
CommonCompletedMessage
Represents a message that contains information about who completed a common goal card.
connectionType
Represent a connection with is type (socket or RMI) and the way to talk with the client (PrintWriter or RMIconnection).
CreateLobbyMessage
This class represents a message for creating a lobby in a game.
DefaultErrorMessage
This class represents a message of error.
EndGameMessage
This class represents a message for ending the game.
endSceneController
Controller for end scene.
Game
Represents a game.
gameController
It is used by the server controller to modify the games/lobbies created.
gameSceneController
Controller for game scene.
GeneralMessage
This abstract class represents a general message in a client-server communication.
GUI
It implements the view interface managing GUI's output.
JoinLobbyMessage
This class represents a message for joining a lobby in a game.
Launcher
Extra starter class that does not inherit from javafx.application.Application.
Lobby
Represent a lobby in the game.
lobbySceneController
Controller for the lobby scene.
nameSceneController
Controller for name scene
OtherPlayersMessage
This class represents a message for requesting the shelf of other players in the game.
PersonalCard
Represents the personal goal card.
PickTilesMessage
This class represents a message for picking tiles in a game.
PingMessage
This class represents a ping message for both RMI and socket connection.
Player
Represents a player.
Position
Represents a pair of indices used to indicate a position on the board.
ReconnectMessage
This class represents a message of reconnection.
RMIclientImpl
It implements the RMIconnection interface, in order to be able to establish RMI connection client side.
RMIconnection
Remote interface.
RMIserverImpl
It implements the RMIconnection interface, in order to be able to establish RMI connection server side.
SelectColumnMessage
This class represents a message for selecting a column in game.
SelectOrderMessage
This class represents a message for selecting the order of the tiles.
Server
It represents a server able to establish connections with multiple client, both via socket and RMI.
serverController
It interacts with the server and the gameController, in order to modify the instance of the game.
SetNameMessage
This class represents a message for setting a nickname for the game.
ShowCommonCards
This class represents a message for sending and requesting common cards.
ShowLobbyMessage
This class represents a message for showing lobbies.
ShowPersonalCardMessage
This class represents a message for sending and requesting personal cards.
SimpleReply
This class represents a simple reply.
StartGameMessage
This class represents a message for starting a game.
Tile
Represents a tile of the game.
type
Enumeration of the possible types for tile.
UpdateBoardMessage
This class represents a message for warning the update of the board or shelf.
UpdateLobbyMessage
This class represents a message for warning any type of update of the lobby.
View
Interface that declare all methods necessary for display the game.
